The images have been shared more than 3: 000 times on a Facebook page with over 280,000 followers.
The list of courses ranks them in order: with "Architecture" being ranked first and "Public Relations" being ranked 55th.
The claim originated from a misleading F: but a reverse image search revealed that the source of the list was not Harvard University, but rather an article published by the student newspaper The Tab in 2017.
